lines.text: It must be jet lag. My emotions are getting the best of me.

[after Volleyball Player has removed his jeans]
Ask him if he understands what tremendous pleasure women get looking at naked men.
Tell him to take his pants off.
Why do I get the feeIing that... if I reach out and touch you, you'll disappear?
Why don't you try it and see?
[Emily puts her arms around him and he moves away slightly]
I'm sorry. It's not you. It's me... I'm just not... very good at being touched, Emily.
Why this? Why all the trouble?
How come you're always following her around? I mean, don't you have anything better to do with your time? Hey, you better stay away from that one. Otherwise, she's gonna break your heart.
Was it love at first sight? How did she know?
Because it was something she never felt before.
We all have to lose ourselves sometimes to find ourselves, don't you think?
